name: immersive-art-bg-market

scripts.prepare-marketplace: npm run build && mkdir -p publish && cp dist/plugin.js plugin.json plugin.yml publish/
scripts.publish-local: npm run prepare-marketplace && mkdir -p "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sh.cider.genten/plugins/com.danielc0603.immersiveartbg" && cp publish/* "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sh.cider.genten/plugins/com.danielc0603.immersiveartbg/"

author: Daniel
description: Blurred album art as immersive background for Cider
